about_the_game:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.

Intense Horde Survival Gameplay

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.

Upgrade and Customize

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks.

Sprawling Maps

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

Epic Boss Battles

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities.

Multiplayer Mayhem

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

Progression and Customization

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

Story:

In the aftermath of a devastating viral outbreak, it seems the world is overrun by monstrous creatures known as "The Ridden." As a survivor with extraordinary powers, your mission is to eradicate these mutants and stop the spread of the virus. Taunted by a shadowy figure who controls the monsters, you must master your abilities, defeat the hordes, and confront this mysterious adversary in a final showdown that will determine the fate of the world.

Frenzy Extinction is set in the same universe as its predecessor Frenzy VR, yet it tells a self-contained story, making it accessible for newcomers and veterans alike. With its low-poly design and optional gore settings, the game caters to a broad audience, ensuring an exhilarating experience for all players.

Join the fight, upgrade your arsenal, and stop the viral apocalypse in Frenzy Extinction. Prepare for a relentless, action-packed journey that will keep you and your friends coming back for more.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains stylized cartoon violence directed at non-human characters. The violence is depicted up close and involves player interaction, but it is presented in a non-realistic, exaggerated manner.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-13100F 3.4 GHz Quad-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta Quest, Valve Index
